locationId.description: The ID of the physical location where the order was processed. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
locationId.title: Location Name or ID

sourceName.description: Where the order originated. Can be set only during order creation, and is not writeable afterwards.
sourceName.title: Source Name

tags.description: Tags attached to the order, formatted as a string of comma-separated values
tags.title: Tags

note.description: An optional note that a shop owner can attach to the order
note.title: Note

productOptions.description: The custom product property names like Size, Color, and Material. You can add up to 3 options of up to 255 characters each.
productOptions.title: Options

images.description: A list of product image objects, each one representing an image associated with the product
images.title: Images

updated_at.description: The date and time when the product image was last modified
updated_at.title: Updated At

id.description: A unique numeric identifier for the product image
id.title: ID

width.description: Width dimension of the image which is determined on upload
width.title: Width

height.description: Height dimension of the image which is determined on upload
height.title: Height

product_id.description: The ID of the product associated with the image
product_id.title: Product ID

variant_ids.description: An array of variant IDs associated with the image
variant_ids.title: Variant IDs

position.description: The order of the product image in the list. The first product image is at position 1 and is the "main" image for the product.
position.title: Position

created_at.description: The date and time when the product image was created
created_at.title: Created At

src.description:
Specifies the location of the product image. This parameter supports URL filters that you can use to retrieve modified copies of the image.

For example, add _small, to the filename to retrieve a scaled copy of the image at 100 x 100 px (for example, ipod-nano_small.png), or add _2048x2048 to retrieve a copy of the image constrained at 2048 x 2048 px resolution (for example, ipod-nano_2048x2048.png).

.
src.title: Source

handle.description: A unique human-friendly string for the product. Automatically generated from the product's title. Used by the Liquid templating language to refer to objects.
handle.title: Handle

product_type.description: A categorization for the product used for filtering and searching products
product_type.title: Product Type

tags.description: A string of comma-separated tags that are used for filtering and search. A product can have up to 250 tags. Each tag can have up to 255 characters.
tags.title: Tags

vendor.description: The name of the product's vendor
vendor.title: Vendor

template_suffix.description: The suffix of the Liquid template used for the product page. If this property is specified, then the product page uses a template called "product.suffix.liquid", where "suffix" is the value of this property. If this property is "" or null, then the product page uses the default template "product.liquid". (default: null)
template_suffix.title: Template Suffix

published_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was published. Can be set to null to unpublish the product from the Online Store channel.
published_at.title: Published At

body_html.description: A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting.
body_html.title: Body HTML

code.description: When the associated discount application is of type code
code.title: Code

amount.description: The amount that's deducted from the order total
amount.title: Amount

type.description: When the associated discount application is of type code
type.title: Type

fulfillmentStatus.description: The order's status in terms of fulfilled line items
fulfillmentStatus.title: Fulfillment Status

sendReceipt.description: Whether to send an order confirmation to the customer
sendReceipt.title: Send Receipt

sendFulfillmentReceipt.description: Whether to send a shipping confirmation to the customer
sendFulfillmentReceipt.title: Send Fulfillment Receipt

locationId.title: Location Name or ID

sourceName.title: Source Name

tags.title: Tags

inventoryBehaviour.description: The behaviour to use when updating inventory
inventoryBehaviour.title: Inventory Behaviour

test.description: Whether this is a test order
test.title: Test

note.title: Note

tags.description: A string of comma-separated tags that are used for filtering and search. A product can have up to 250 tags. Each tag can have up to 255 characters.

vendor.title: Vendor

If this property is specified, then the product page uses a template called "product.suffix.liquid", where "suffix" is the value of this property. If this property is "" or null, then the product page uses the default template "product.liquid". (default: null)

published_at.description: The date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the product was published. Can be set to null to unpublish the product from the Online Store channel.

body_html.description: A description of the product. Supports HTML formatting.
body_html.title: Body HTML

fields.description: Fields the product will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.
fields.title: Fields

ids.description: Return only products specified by a comma-separated list of product IDs
ids.title: IDs

presentment_currencies.description: Return presentment prices in only certain currencies, specified by a comma-separated list of ISO 4217 currency codes
presentment_currencies.title: Presentment Currencies

updated_at_max.description: Show products last updated before date
updated_at_max.title: Updated At Max

collection_id.description: Filter results by product collection ID
collection_id.title: Collection ID

updated_at_min.description: Show products last updated after date
updated_at_min.title: Updated At Min

published_status.description: Return products by their published status
published_status.title: Published Status

fields.description: Show only certain fields, specified by a comma-separated list of field names
fields.title: Fields

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
anyOf.title: Return All

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

anyOf.description: Max number of results to return
anyOf.title: Limit

fields.description: Fields the order will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.
fields.title: Fields

fulfillmentStatus.description: Filter orders by their fulfillment status
fulfillmentStatus.title: Fulfillment Status

financialStatus.description: Filter orders by their financial status
financialStatus.title: Financial Status

createdAtMax.description: Show orders created at or before date
createdAtMax.title: Created At Max

ids.description: Retrieve only orders specified by a comma-separated list of order IDs
ids.title: IDs

processedAtMax.description: Show orders imported at or before date
processedAtMax.title: Processed At Max

attributionAppId.description: Show orders attributed to a certain app, specified by the app ID. Set as current to show orders for the app currently consuming the API.
attributionAppId.title: Attribution App ID

updatedAtMin.description: Show orders last updated at or before date
updatedAtMin.title: Updated At Min

updatedAtMax.description: Show orders last updated at or after date
updatedAtMax.title: Updated At Max

sinceId.description: Show orders after the specified ID
sinceId.title: Since ID

fields.description: Fields the orders will return, formatted as a string of comma-separated values. By default all the fields are returned.
fields.title: Fields

createdAtMin.description: Show orders created at or after date
createdAtMin.title: Created At Min

processedAtMin.description: Show orders imported at or after date
processedAtMin.title: Processed At Min

grams.description: The weight of the item in grams
grams.title: Grams

variantId.description: The ID of the product variant
variantId.title: Variant ID

quantity.description: The number of items that were purchased
quantity.title: Quantity

productId.description: The ID of the product that the line item belongs to. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.
productId.title: Product Name or ID
